name: Fentrissa
description: a strong, sinewy woman with a hard look about her.

65: "Smell that salt air, friend. Brings a tear to me eye..."
"Welcome, welcome!" She slaps you heartily on the back.
"A strong name, as strong as the @sea." She looks into the distance.
"Beautiful thing, but a @jealous man he is."
"If ya ask me, men are much more unpredictable."
"Sorry, I sold you my last one."
"Sorry, I sold you my last one."
"I'm out of work after selling you all my ships and skiffs."
"I have @ships for sale, but I sold you my last @skiff."
"I sold you my last @ship, but I still have some @skiffs left."
"Have a good one." She bows, hands on her hips.
1165: $N turns to $Y, "It'll cost you #4 gold for the deed. Interested?"
$N looks at $Y. "You look pretty full to me."
"Excellent!" After accepting the gold, $N hands $Y the deed.
1656: "It looks like you're #1 gold piece\s short."
Your party takes up a collection for the deed.
